description: SuperMega Mark 1 — n8n Workflow Templates for Autonomous Operations

workflows.name: Daily Email Digest
workflows.description: Scans Gmail for priority emails from key domains (yangontyre.com, evergreenmyanmar, supermega.dev) and senders (KIIC, Junky). Generates a daily summary and posts to Slack/Dashboard.
nodes: Gmail Trigger → Filter by Domain/Sender → Classify Priority → Summarize with AI → Post to Dashboard → Update machine-status.json

workflows.name: Google Drive File Monitor
workflows.description: Monitors key Google Drive folders for new/modified files. Triggers data extraction pipeline when new files appear in monitored folders.
nodes: Drive Webhook → Identify Folder → Classify File Type → Extract Data (OCR if image) → Update Knowledge Base → Notify Dashboard

workflows.name: Invoice Auto-Processor
workflows.description: Processes incoming invoices from email attachments. Extracts data, validates against PO, and creates entries in Odoo.
nodes: Gmail Trigger → Extract Attachment → OCR/Parse → Validate Against PO → Create Odoo Entry → Send Confirmation → Log to Dashboard

workflows.name: Lead Generation Pipeline
workflows.description: Scrapes Google Maps for businesses in target categories. Enriches with LinkedIn data. Scores and adds to CRM.
nodes: Google Maps Scraper → Data Enrichment → Lead Scoring → CRM Entry → Outreach Email Draft → Queue for Review

workflows.name: Content Calendar Automation
workflows.description: Generates weekly content calendar for social media. Creates drafts using AI. Schedules posts.
nodes: Generate Topics → AI Content Draft → Image Generation → Schedule Posts → Update Calendar → Notify for Review

workflows.name: Automated System Backup
workflows.description: Backs up all critical data: database dumps, configuration files, secrets inventory. Stores in S3 with versioning.
nodes: Trigger → Dump PostgreSQL → Export Odoo Data → Snapshot Configs → Compress → Upload to S3 → Verify → Report

workflows.name: AWS Cost Monitor
workflows.description: Monitors AWS spending. Alerts when approaching budget thresholds. Generates daily cost report.
nodes: AWS Cost Explorer API → Parse Costs → Compare to Budget → Generate Report → Alert if Threshold → Update Dashboard

workflows.name: Calendar Intelligence
workflows.description: Syncs Google Calendar events. Prepares daily briefing. Auto-schedules follow-ups after meetings.
nodes: Fetch Today's Events → Generate Briefing → Check Prep Materials → Send Morning Brief → Post-Meeting: Auto-Create Follow-Up Tasks

workflows.name: GitHub Activity Tracker
workflows.description: Monitors all GitHub repositories for commits, issues, PRs. Updates machine status and generates activity reports.
nodes: GitHub Webhook → Parse Event → Update machine-status.json → Generate Activity Log → Weekly Summary

workflows.name: Agent Health Monitor
workflows.description: Pings all running agents every 5 minutes. Restarts failed agents. Escalates persistent failures.
nodes: Ping All Agents → Check Response → If Failed: Restart → If Still Failed: Escalate → Update Dashboard → Log

workflows.name: Stripe Payment Reconciliation
workflows.description: Reconciles Stripe payments with Odoo invoices. Flags discrepancies. Generates monthly financial report.
nodes: Stripe Webhook → Match to Odoo Invoice → Update Payment Status → Flag Discrepancies → Monthly Report

workflows.name: Knowledge Base Ingestion
workflows.description: Processes new documents added to Google Drive. Extracts text, generates embeddings, adds to vector database for RAG.
nodes: New File Detected → Extract Text (PDF/DOCX/Image OCR) → Chunk Text → Generate Embeddings → Store in Vector DB → Index → Confirm
